US.name: S&P 500
US.description: Represents the performance of the 500 largest publicly traded companies in the US.

US.name: Dow Jones Industrial Average
US.description: Tracks the performance of 30 large, publicly owned companies in the US.

US.name: NASDAQ Composite
US.description: Measures the performance of all companies listed on the NASDAQ stock exchange.

US.name: Russell 2000
US.description: Measures the performance of approximately 2,000 small-cap companies in the United States.

US.name: CBOE Volatility Index
US.description: A measure of market expectations of near-term volatility as conveyed by S&P 500 stock index option prices.

EU.name: FTSE 100
EU.description: Represents the top 100 companies by market capitalization on the London Stock Exchange.

EU.name: DAX PERFORMANCE-INDEX
EU.description: Measures the performance of the 30 largest companies on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange.

EU.name: CAC 40
EU.description: Represents the top 40 companies by market capitalization on Euronext Paris.

EU.name: ESTX 50 PR.EUR
EU.description: Tracks the performance of the 50 largest and most liquid stocks in the Eurozone.

EU.name: FTSE MIB
EU.description: Measures the performance of the top 40 companies on the Borsa Italiana stock exchange.

Asia.name: Nikkei 225
Asia.description: Represents the 225 most actively traded companies on the Tokyo Stock Exchange.

Asia.name: HANG SENG INDEX
Asia.description: Tracks the performance of the largest and most liquid companies listed in Hong Kong.

Asia.name: SSE Composite Index
Asia.description: Reflects the performance of all stocks listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange.

Asia.name: KOSPI Composite Index
Asia.description: Represents the performance of all companies listed on the Korea Exchange.

Asia.name: S&P BSE SENSEX
Asia.description: Tracks the performance of 30 large, publicly traded companies in India.
